ygData.subject: RE: What does this mean????
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, that makes sense. I was kicking butt pretty good with it so I couldn t figure out why I was getting that message, I seemed to be commanding that weapon
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, that makes sense. I was kicking butt pretty good with it so I
couldn't figure out why I was getting that message, I seemed to be
"commanding" that weapon pretty well I thought! ;)

-----Original Message-----
Message: 2
Date: Mon, 22 Jul 2002 19:49:09 -0000
From: "bigmaca3" <bigmaca3@...>
Subject: Re: What does this mean????

--- In EverQuest@y..., "Steven R. Hulse" <steve@k...> wrote:
> Hi again everyone!
>
> Yesterday I was playing Genmay, my Gnome Warrior and I'm
using a
> mace as my weapon. I kept getting a message saying something like my
> will isn't right to command this weapon. What does that mean? That
I'm
> not able to use it or more specifically my class doesn't wield this
> weapon as well as others? Heck I seemed to be kicking some butt
with it
> as my hits were ranking between 12-16 points each. Any ideas?

It sounds like you have a Velium weapon. Those are pretty common
anymore. They come in almost all weapon types and are easy to find.
They usually go for around 10 plat. Most people use them because
they are magic and they can hunt magic only mobs. Their ratios are
good until about 20, then you should be able to get better.

Tul
